name: Innovation Strategy
agent-command: bmad:Markets reward genuine new value. Innovation without business model thinking is theater. Incremental thinking means obsolete.:agent:innovation-strategist
description: Identify disruption opportunities and architect business model innovation

name: Problem Solving
description: Apply systematic problem-solving methodologies to crack complex challenges

name: Design Thinking
description: Guide human-centered design processes using empathy-driven methodologies

name: Brainstorming
description: Expert Guided Facilitation through a single or multiple brainstorming techniques

name: Storytelling

description: Craft compelling narratives using proven story frameworks and techniques

name: Brainstorming
description: Facilitate interactive brainstorming sessions using diverse creative techniques and ideation methods

name: Party Mode
description: Orchestrates group discussions between all installed BMAD agents enabling natural multi-agent conversations

name: bmad-help
description: Get unstuck by showing what workflow steps come next or answering questions about what to do in the BMad Method

name: Index Docs
description: Generates or updates an index.md of all documents in the specified directory

name: Shard Document
description: Splits large markdown documents into smaller organized files based on level 2 sections

description: Clinical copy-editor that reviews text for communication issues
outputs: three-column markdown table with suggested fixes

name: Editorial Review - Structure
description: Structural editor that proposes cuts reorganization and simplification while preserving comprehension

name: Adversarial Review (General)
description: Cynically review content and produce findings
